# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="72ba9-102">Lagre meldinger i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72ba9-103">Du kan ikke lagre e-postmeldinger i Outlook.com, men du kan skrive dem ut på en PDF-fil som du kan lagre på PC-en.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72ba9-104">Microsoft Print to PDF-verktøyet som følger med Windows 10, lar deg skrive ut e-postmeldinger direkte til en PDF-fil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="72ba9-105">Velg meldingen du vil lagre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="72ba9-106">Merk de tre prikkene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="72ba9-107">øverst i meldingen, og velg deretter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="72ba9-108">**Skrive ut**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="72ba9-109">Velg **Skriv ut** på nytt, og velg deretter **Microsoft Skriv ut til PDF**på rulle gardin menyen skriver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="72ba9-110">Velg **Skriv ut**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="72ba9-111">Skriv inn et fil navn, og velg deretter **Lagre**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72ba9-112">**Obs!** Dette anbefales ikke på delte eller offentlige data maskiner som andre brukere kan ha tilgang til PDF-filer du lagrer på PC-en, og som ikke kan slettes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72ba9-113">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om utskrift, kan du se [skrive ut e-postmeldinger, vedlegg og kalendere i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72ba9-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
